desc: Returns the Credentials of the Channel on the Server treating this Command

parameters.label: casUser
parameters.desc: The cas:user field of the XML response returned by the 3DPassport server for authentifying the connection

parameters.label: casUserId
parameters.desc: The cas:userId field of the XML response returned by the 3DPassport server for authentifying the connection

parameters.label: passportURL
parameters.desc: The 3DPassport URL used for authentifying the connection (setting of the Hypervisor)

parameters.label: serviceURL
parameters.desc: The service URL used for authentifying the connection (given with the ticket on the client side)

parameters.label: json
parameters.desc: A JSON view ofthe XML response returned by the 3DPassport server for authentifying the connection
